Address.Address1: Olaya St, Al Olaya, Riyadh 12241, Saudi Arabia

Description.Text: Located in the heart of Riyadh city. Conveniently located on the popular Olaya Street, Rosh Rayhaan by Rotana is surrounded by shopping districts and is only a short 20-minute drive from Riyadh International Airport.

Caramel Lobby Lounge - With its contemporary design, the interior of the grand and elegant Caramel Lobby Lounge is immersed with streams of natural light through its enormous floor to ceiling windows. It is the ideal place to meet people for business or leisure while indu. Flavours All Day Dining - Flavours all day dining restaurant offers an exciting range of daily alternating buffet meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner as well as a variety of a la carte choices. Making the dining experience even more intriguing, the restaurant offers an exten. Speciality - Our signature restaurant offers a blend of 5-different cuisines inspired by various cultures from around the world, Thai, Chinese, Japanese Sushi, Indian and Italian. Guests can experience entertaining live cooking at the open concept kitchen and a uni. Sama Lounge - Sama Lounge, an open-air terrace, where guests may delight in a combination of international and oriental dishes all day long. Those looking for a peaceful atmosphere will find this secluded venue, away from the bustle of the metropolitan Riyadh, most. Oasis Pool Cafe - Oasis Pool Cafe is the perfect open-air place to feel refreshed while relaxing around the pool, nibbling on light snacks, and sipping on rounds of thirst quenching mocktails and innovative refreshments. The friendly, informal ambience puts you at ease.
